title: Design for  Printed Textile: Manhattan, Series #490-494
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Ink, colored pencil and graphite on white tracing paper
description: Checkered arrangement of black vertically oriented rectangles that resemble skyscraper windows. Repeats at left and right.
name: Drawing
